relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named an Outperformer and Challenger in the 2023 GigaOm Radar for Alternatives to Amazon S3
relatedBlades.copy:
<style>
  .grid__item--third {
  vertical-align: top;
    margin-bottom: auto;
  }
  </style>

Cloudflare's R2 object storage, has been recognized as an Outperformer and Challenger in the 2023 GigaOm Radar for Alternatives to Amazon S3. The GigaOm Radar report evaluated 13 vendor solutions across a series of concentric rings, with those set closer to the center judged to be of higher overall value.

R2 is a central component of the Cloudflare Developer Platform which offers all the primitives needed to build and run a full-stack application on Cloudflare's network of over 285 global locations. 

The Developer Platform includes:

- Compute to power the logic of your applications 
- Messaging to route and process requests 
- Storage of assets and session state 
- Real-time communication for coordination of requests and building collaborative apps
- Observability for debugging and troubleshooting 

Read the report to: 

- Understand the current object storage landscape
- Learn about key object storage capabilities when looking for an alternative to S3 
- Discover why R2 is recognized as an Outperformer 

![2023 GigaOm Radar for Alternatives to Amazon S3 - image](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/yZlwXkaFZwKaNPyG0fDkd/ce1d89eb820be6edf0d70833ea088c66/s3_gigaom.png)
